abstract: New York Islanders fans in Section 329 of the Nassau Coliseum call themselves the Blue and Orange Army, and stand for entire games; many are too young to remember team's last victorious playoff series in 1993, but that does not stop them from singing and leading their favorite chants; Islanders will move to Barclays Center in Brooklyn next season.
lead_paragraph: Many of the singing, chanting fans in Section 329 of Nassau Coliseum are too young to remember the Islanders’ last victorious playoff series, in 1993.
snippet: Many of the singing, chanting fans in Section 329 of Nassau Coliseum are too young to remember the Islanders’ last victorious playoff series, in 1993.

headline.main: Islanders Enjoy a Raucous Advantage in Their Soon-to-Be Former Home
headline.print_headline: Raucous Advantage for Isles in Soon-to-Be Former Home
